Html:
Hi all,

I know many people like this project and would like the project to be live again. I don't know when Scott will be free, and I even can't contact with him by mail. So I'm think if we could continue this project? Any suggestion?

Sincerely,
Roy (Rabbit on the People List)

I agree. I love the Ascend controls, but have a few questions about their limitations.

I can't set the GradiantNavigationButton as the default button on a form.

The controls don't seem to support ToolTips. Instead I get a weird Win32 error when trying to call SetToolTip on them.

// Dave
